title: The Courage of Marge O’Doone
description: On a snowbound train at the edge of the Arctic, David Raine tells a stranger his story: a tale of a man destroyed by his wife's betrayal, a man who walked away from vengeance into the darkness of his own despair. The stranger is Father Roland, a wilderness missioner who has spent years in the vast northern forests. He knows something about men who have lost themselves—and he knows how they can be found again.

the Little Missioner asks, offering David escape into a world of mystery and savage glory, where the wind wails through spruce forests and the cold cuts like a knife. But the North holds its own secrets: a woman searching desperately for a man named Michael O'Doone, and truths buried deeper than snow.

A story of redemption and wilderness, where broken souls seek healing in the last untamed places of the earth.
